    • jaxbContext

      static Class[] jaxbContext()

    • error

      static org.biopax.validator.api.beans.ErrorType error(String objectName, String errorCode, String ruleName, boolean isFixed, Object... msgArgs)
      Creates default error.
      Parameters:
      objectName - name of the problematic model object
      errorCode - validator error code
      ruleName - validation rule name
      isFixed - true/false - whether it's auto-fixed or not
      msgArgs - error message details
      Returns:
      error type

    • getMarshaller

      static javax.xml.bind.Marshaller getMarshaller()
      Gets the validation results (xml) marshaller.
      Returns:
      jaxb marshaller

      unmarshaller

      Writes the multiple results report. (as transformed XML).

      validatorResponse - results
      writer - output
      xslt - source

      Writes the single validation report. (as transformed XML).

    • getMaxErrors

      int getMaxErrors()
      Gets current max number of errors to report.
      Returns:
      maximal no. errors to be collected (to abort and return the results)

    • setMaxErrors

      void setMaxErrors(int max)
      Sets current max number of errors to report.
      Parameters:
      max - maximal no. errors to be collected (to abort and return the results)

    • createError

      org.biopax.validator.api.beans.ErrorType createError(String objectName, String errorCode, String ruleName, String profile, boolean isFixed, Object... msgArgs)
      Creates an error type with single error case.
      Parameters:
      objectName - name of the problematic model object
      errorCode - validator error code
      ruleName - validation rule name
      profile - validation profile
      isFixed - true/false - whether it's auto-fixed or not
      msgArgs - error message details
      Returns:
      error type obj.

    • getRuleBehavior

      org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Behavior getRuleBehavior(String ruleName, String profile)
      Gets rule's behavior (mode), to be used when registering an error case reported by the rule.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - validation rule class name, e.g., org.biopax.validator.rules.MyRule
      profile - validation profile name or null (default profile)
      Returns:
      error level
      See Also:
      • Behavior

    • getRuleDescription

      String getRuleDescription(String ruleName)
      Parameters:
      ruleName - validation rule class name, e.g., org.biopax.validator.rules.MyRule
      Returns:
      rule description
